User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

On http://lists.w3.org/Archives/Public/w3c-wai-au/

1. I tabbed focus to link "October to December 2005" then I used ctrl++ to zoom in to 200%.

2. Then I used the vertical scrollbar to center the selected link ("October to December 2005") in the window. Then I used ctrl+- to zoom out.




Actual results:

1. The selected link did not stay on screen.

2.  Once again the selected link did not stay on screen.




Expected results:

1. The selected link should have stayed on screen (the same way that form fields do e.g. on the same page when "Search this list for" textfield has focus zoom-in/out works well).

2. The selected link should have stayed on screen.
